summaries.title: Digital Platforms Driving Efficiency and Accountability in Agricultural Schemes, says Agriculture Secretary Dr Devesh Chaturvedi
summaries.summary:
- Digital platforms are improving efficiency in agricultural schemes.
- Agriculture Secretary Dr. Devesh Chaturvedi highlighted the importance of these technologies.
- The use of digital tools enhances accountability in managing agricultural programs.
- The initiative aims to benefit farmers and streamline government processes.
- Increased transparency is a key goal of these digital efforts.

summaries.title: From Abandonment to Opportunity: BCCL Revives Legacy Coal Mine via MDO Model
summaries.summary:
- BCCL (Bharat Coking Coal Limited) is reviving an abandoned coal mine using the MDO (Mine Developer and Operator) model.  
- This initiative aims to enhance coal production and create job opportunities.  
- The project focuses on sustainable mining practices and efficient resource management.  
- The revival will help meet the increasing demand for coal in India.  
- It aligns with the government's efforts to boost the coal sector and promote economic growth.

summaries.title: “The Indian Telecom Services Yearly Performance Indicators” for the year 2024-25
summaries.summary:
- The Indian Telecom Services report for 2024-25 was released by the Ministry of Communications.  
- It highlights the growth and performance indicators of the telecom sector in India.  
- The report shows an increase in mobile and internet users across the country.  
- It emphasizes improvements in service quality and network coverage.  
- The document aims to guide future policies and investments in the telecom industry.

summaries.title: IBC to Celebrate Āshāḍha Pūrṇimā – Dhammacakkappavattana Divas at Sarnath on 10 July
summaries.summary:
- The Ministry of Culture will celebrate Āshāḍha Pūrṇimā on July 10 in Sarnath.
- This day is also known as Dhammacakkappavattana Divas, marking Buddha's first sermon.
- The event aims to promote Buddhist teachings and cultural heritage.
- Various activities and programs will be organized for the celebration.
- The celebration highlights India's rich spiritual and cultural history.

summaries.title: Shri Dharmendra Pradhan and Shri Jayant Chaudhary inaugurate Uttar Pradesh Agritech Innovation Hub and Agritech Startup and Technology Showcase at SVPUAT, Meerut
summaries.summary:
- Shri Dharmendra Pradhan and Shri Jayant Chaudhary opened the Uttar Pradesh Agritech Innovation Hub in Meerut.
- The event includes an Agritech Startup and Technology Showcase.
- It aims to promote innovation and technology in agriculture.
- The hub will support startups in the agritech sector.
- The initiative is part of efforts to boost agricultural productivity and sustainability.

summaries.title: No directions given to Banks to close inactive PM Jan Dhan Yojana accounts: Department of Financial Services, M/o Finance
summaries.summary:
- No orders have been issued to banks to close inactive PM Jan Dhan Yojana accounts.  
- The Department of Financial Services clarified this information.  
- The PM Jan Dhan Yojana aims to provide banking access to all citizens.  
- Banks are encouraged to keep the accounts open to support financial inclusion.  
- No specific guidelines for closing accounts have been provided.

summaries.title: Start-Up Accelerator WaveX Launches “Kalaa Setu”, a nation-wide initiative inviting India’s leading AI startups to come up with a real-time multilingual multimedia content generation solution for prompt reach-out to citi...
summaries.summary:
- WaveX has launched "Kalaa Setu" to support AI startups in India.  
- The initiative focuses on developing a real-time multilingual multimedia content generation solution.  
- It aims to enhance communication and reach out to citizens effectively.  
- The program is backed by the Ministry of Information & Broadcasting.  
- Leading AI startups are invited to participate in this nationwide initiative.

summaries.title: Ministry of Mines to organize ‘National District Mineral Foundation (DMF) Workshop’ and SHG Exhibition Tomorrow
summaries.summary:
- The Ministry of Mines will hold a 'National District Mineral Foundation (DMF) Workshop' and SHG Exhibition tomorrow.  
- The event aims to discuss the role of DMF in mineral-rich districts.  
- It will promote Self-Help Groups (SHGs) and their contributions to local development.  
- The workshop will feature experts and stakeholders in the mining sector.  
- This initiative supports sustainable mining practices and community welfare.

summaries.title: Haj Committee of India opens application process for Haj 2026
summaries.summary:
- The Haj Committee of India has started accepting applications for Haj 2026.
- The application process is open to Indian citizens.
- Interested applicants can apply online through the Haj Committee's official website.
- The last date for submitting applications is yet to be announced.
- Applicants must meet specific eligibility criteria to participate.

summaries.title: Catalysing Solar Cooperation: ISA’s Seventh Regional Committee Meeting (RCM) for the Asia and the Pacific Region Set to Advance Regional Partnership
summaries.ministry: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
summaries.summary:
- The International Solar Alliance (ISA) held its Seventh Regional Committee Meeting for Asia and the Pacific.
- The meeting aimed to strengthen solar energy cooperation among member countries.
- Participants discussed strategies to enhance solar energy deployment and financing.
- The event focused on sharing best practices and technologies in solar energy.
- It supports regional partnerships for sustainable energy development.

summaries.title: NHAI Organises Plantation Drive along Faridabad-Noida International Airport Corridor
summaries.summary:
- NHAI organized a plantation drive along the Faridabad-Noida International Airport Corridor.  
- The event aimed to enhance green cover and promote environmental awareness.  
- Participants included local communities, students, and officials from the Ministry of Road Transport & Highways.  
- The initiative supports the government's commitment to sustainable development.  
- Thousands of saplings were planted during the drive.

summaries.title: 54 KW Solar Power Plant inaugurated at Pt. Deendayal Upadhyaya National Institute for Persons with Physical Disabilities
summaries.summary:
- A 54 KW solar power plant was inaugurated at Pt. Deendayal Upadhyaya National Institute for Persons with Physical Disabilities.  
- The inauguration was done by the Minister of Social Justice & Empowerment.  
- The solar plant aims to promote renewable energy and support the institute’s energy needs.  
- It reflects the government's commitment to sustainable development and empowerment of persons with disabilities.  
- The project aligns with India's goals for clean energy and environmental sustainability.
